Abilities.Textual: auto(rc): [c-blast(1)] when an attack hits during the battle that this unit boosted a «nubatama», if the number of cards in your hand is less than your opponent's, you may pay the cost. if you do, your opponent chooses a card from his or her hand, and discards it.
Abilities.Visual: [00ff00][b]AUTO[/b][-](RC): [[b][u][5555ff]C-Blast(1)[-][/u][/b]] When an attack hits during the battle that this unit boosted a «Nubatama», if the number of cards in your hand is less than your opponent's, you may pay the cost. If you do, your opponent chooses a card from his or her hand, and discards it.
